Definition: C.16 - EHDS refined base model for An action that is or was performed on or for a patient

Short: Common header for all patient-related data
Definition: Common header for all patient-related data
Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

Short: Date and time of the last update to the resource
Definition: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

Short: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Definition: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

Short: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document
Definition: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

Short: Date when the procedure was performed
Definition: Date when the procedure was performed

Short: Procedure target body site. Details of where the procedure was performed.
Definition: Procedure target body site. Details of where the procedure was performed. In some cases, it might be needed to consider the laterality as qualifier of the body site.
Binding Description: 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.65 eHDSIBodySite (SCT, used in MH@EU); http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-ver-status (required in HL7 FHIR)

Definition: This element shall be present when used to describe a procedure event. It shall have the value 'completed' for procedures that have been completed and 'active' for procedures that are still in progress. Procedures that were stopped prior to completion shall use the value 'aborted', and procedures that were cancelled before being started shall use the value 'cancelled'.

Short: It indicates the priority of the procedure.
Definition: It indicates the priority of the procedure.
